Stormshield

Incorrect validation of OCSP certificates

Posted on November 27, 2025November 27, 2025 by cert

Advisory ID
STORM-2025-006
CVE ID
CVE-2025-11955
Recommandation
Avoid using/disable the OCSP feature
CVSSv3 score
8.1
Severity
High

Description

In Stormshield VPN Client Exclusive v 7.5.109, a vulnerability on the IKEv2 authentication step of the VPN client may allow the client to establish a tunnel although it did not receive any OCSP response or when the signature of the OCSP response is not valid.

Workaround

The use of a CRL is considered more secure and recommended instead of using the OCSP feature.
The OCSP feature will be completely removed in version 7.7 provided by TheGreenBow, and re-introduced properly in a future major version.

As a reminder, Stormshield no longer provides new versions of VPN Client Exclusive above 7.5. You need to contact TheGreenBow for new versions.

Impacted versions

A single version is impacted : Stormshield Network VPN Client Exclusive 7.5.109

Resolution

A new version of the client is expected soon and will be made available directly by TheGreenBow.
Please contact TheGreenBow for more information.

Categorized as Stormshield Network VPN Client Exclusive Tagged Stormshield Network VPN Client Exclusive
